DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Subject Identification Screening For cohort , patient identified acquisition sustain return spontaneous circulation ( ROSC ) ( > 30 minute ) . If patient meet inclusion/exclusion criterion , patient enrol study . The investigator obtain write informed consent patient representative . 2 . Assignment Subject Number A unique identification number give study subject attempt de-identify information . Subject number assign sequential order . The subject number consist four digit . The first two digit designate study site . The last two digit designate subject number sequential order ( i.e. , subject number 01 01 first subject site 1 ; 01 02 second subject site 1 , etc. ) . 3 . Study Methods - Randomization 36-TH ( core body temperature ( BT ) 36℃ ) 33-TH ( core BT 33℃ ) group perform web base randomization site ( http : //mrcc.snuh.org ) . - Start target temperature management use external cooling device ( Arctic Sun ) within 1 hour post-ROSC . - SctO2 monitoring start within 1 hour post-ROSC maintain 72 hour . - 36-TH ( core BT 36℃ ) 33-TH ( core BT 33℃ ) 24 hour - Rewarming 0.25℃/h 33-TH group - Core temperature < 37.5℃ 72 hour All patient treat per postresuscitation care protocol . Target treatment include - Target : central venous pressure ( CVP ) ( 8 - 12 mmHg ) , mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) ( > 65 mmHg ) , central venous oxygen saturation ( ScvO2 ) ( > 70 % ) - Seizure control , shiver control appropriate - Coronary intervention soon possible need - Infection control indicate - Other supportive care Monitoring data include - CVP , MAP , ScvO2 , lactate , neuron specific enolase ( NSE ) , end-tidal carbon dioxide ( EtCO2 ) , input-output ( I/O ) balance - Intermittent electroencephalography ( EEG ) monitoring ( 2 times/72 hour ) - Laboratory data include arterial blood gas analysis ( ABGA ) , complete blood count ( CBC ) , liver function test ( LFT ) , electrolyte , blood urea nitrogen/creatinine ( BUN/Cr ) , et al . - SctO2 - Core ( esophageal bladder ) temperature 4 . Data Collection Study data collect follow manner : • All data collect appropriate Case Report Forms .
